Parameters.desc: Transform for positioning the gizmo in world space
Radius of the sphere/cylinder or side of the box (according to 'shape' type). For box shape, if height/length are valid, this is box width
If true, the volume *outside* the gizmo will be rendered and the inside volume is excluded
Determines the shape of the gizmo (0 - Sphere, 1 - Box, 2 - Cylinder with the Y-axis as height)
Length parameter for the box. If zero, the 'radius' parameter will be used to set the length. Note this parameter is not used if SphereFade::legacy_mode is 1
Height parameter for the cylinder/box. If zero, the 'radius' parameter will be used to set the height. Note this parameter is not used if SphereFade::legacy_mode is 1
